sentences.en: But the roller blade installation method for a clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 而网纹辊的刮刀安设法有顺时针与逆时针法.

sentences.en: Do the vanes in the figure rotate clockwise or counterclockwise?
sentences.cn: 图中叶片的旋转方向是顺时针的,还是反时针的?

sentences.en: Fly a counterclockwise circle while rolling the helicopter to the right.
sentences.cn: 以直升机向右侧滚的方式,执行逆时针方向的水平圆.

sentences.en: However, there is also an eddy of cooler water (purple) circulating counterclockwise at the top of the Loop Current.
sentences.cn: 不过，在洋流的顶端还出现一个逆时针方向旋转的水流（紫色部分），而且温度较低。

sentences.en: If the wheel is rotating counterclockwise, its angular - momentum vector is directed eastward.
sentences.cn: 如果轮子是逆时针方向旋转, 其角动量矢量的方向朝东.

sentences.en: Repeat the above step , but this time start pirouetting counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 机体以逆时针的方向保持自旋,重覆执行步骤3.

sentences.en: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

sentences.en: Rotate turn signal bulb socket counterclockwise, pull on bulb to remove.
sentences.cn: 逆时钟旋转转向信号灯灯泡插座, 拔下灯泡.

sentences.en: Such storms spin counterclockwise in the Northern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这种旋暴风在北半球是作逆时针方向旋转.

sentences.en: The dance moves in a counterclockwise direction.
sentences.cn: 这支舞是按逆时针方向跳的。

sentences.en: The direction of conventional current flow is counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 传统的电流方向是逆时针方向.

sentences.en: The direction of the whirlpool, whether clockwise or counterclockwise, was also noted.
sentences.cn: 漩涡的方向, 不论是顺时针还是逆时针, 都会予以注意.

sentences.en: This connection has a right - hand thread ( loosens counterclockwise ).
sentences.cn: 这种接头有右手螺纹 ( 逆时针方向松开 ).

sentences.en: To lower the balance , turn front leveling feet counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 电子天平下降, 左旋前面地脚螺栓.

sentences.en: To lower the reduced pressure turn the adjusting screw counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 如果要降低水压,则逆时针方向旋转调节螺丝.

sentences.en: Web browsing, clockwise Guoquan, to enlarge page, counterclockwise Guoquan narrow website.
sentences.cn: 网页浏览, 顺时针划圈, 放大网页, 逆时针划圈缩小网页.

trans.tran_cn: 逆时针方向的，自右向左的

trans.tran_en: If something is moving counterclockwise, it is moving in the opposite direction to the direction in which the hands of a clock move

trans.tran_cn: 逆时针方向地，自右向左地
trans.tran_en: If something is moving counterclockwise, it is moving in the opposite direction to the direction in which the hands of a clock move
